==Abilities==
''Most ability names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Electro Mitachurl

|name_1 = Swing Combo
|desc_1 = Swings its axe up to 3 times, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} or {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
|file_1 = Electro Mitachurl 2-Swing Combo 2
|caption_1 = 2-Swing Combo
|file_1_2 = Electro Mitachurl 2-Swing Combo
|caption_1_2 = 2-Swing Combo (Infused)
|file_1_3 = Electro Mitachurl 3-Swing Combo
|caption_1_3 = 3-Swing Combo (Infused)

|name_2 = Ripple Electro Edge + Electro Slime Toss
|file_2 = Electro Mitachurl Electro Slime Throw
|desc_2 = After some time has passed or when the player character is out of reach, the Crackling Axe Mitachurl will dig up Electro Slimes from the ground to charge its axe before throwing it to the player, dealing '''37.5% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
* When infused, the axe is considered an {{Electro}} entity, and can [[Elemental Reactions|react]] with {{Hydro}}, {{Cryo}}, {{Pyro}}, {{Anemo}}, {{Geo}}; If 3 [[Elemental Gauge Theory|gauges]] of {{Cryo}}/{{Pyro}} or 6 gauges of {{Anemo}}/{{Geo}} are applied to the axe, its infusion will be removed.

|name_3 = Axe Spin
|desc_3 = Spins the axe wildly, rapidly dealing '''12.5% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} or {{Color|Electro DMG}}. At the end of this attack, performs a powerful final swing, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} or {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
|file_3 = Electro Mitachurl Axe Spin 2
|caption_3 = Physical
|file_3_2 = Electro Mitachurl Axe Spin
|caption_3_2 = Infused

|name_4 = Axe Dance
|desc_4 = Performs a two-move dance with its axe to deal '''50% ATK''' and '''75% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. This attack can only be used while the axe is infused.
* '''Enhanced:''' Enhanced Crackling Axe Mitachurls can be found in certain [[Domains]], [[Spiral Abyss]], overworld events, and challenges. After performing '''Axe Dance''', summons 3 thunder strikes respectively around it, each dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
|caption_4 = Normal
|file_4_2 = Electro Mitachurl Axe Dance Enhanced
|caption_4_2 = Enhanced

|name_5 = Electro Slime Throw
|desc_5 = If the character is at a differing elevation from the Mitachurl, throws either an Electro Slime or a small Mutant Electro Slime, dealing '''62.5% ATK''' or '''75% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
|file_5 = Electro Mitachurl Electro Slime Throw 2

|name_6 = Lightning Axe
|desc_6 = Raises its axe to summon a powerful lightning to strike down the player character, dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}. The lightning is so tremendous that it will shock the Mitachurl to the ground, stunning it briefly. This attack is only used during stormy weather or in domains.

|name_7 = Axe Slam
|desc_7 = Leaps into the air to slam down at the player's location with their axe, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}} or {{Color|Electro DMG}}. This attack is only performed by enhanced Crackling Axe Mitachurls.
* '''Enhanced:''' Enhanced Crackling Axe Mitachurls can be found in certain [[Domains]], [[Spiral Abyss]], overworld events, and challenges. After performing an infused '''Axe Slam''', summons 4 thunder strikes respectively around it, each dealing '''50% ATK''' as {{Color|Electro DMG}}.
|file_7 = Electro Mitachurl Axe Slam 2
|caption_7 = Physical
|file_7_2 = Electro Mitachurl Axe Slam Enhanced
|caption_7_2 = Enhanced

==Descriptions==
{{Description|Muscular hilichurls who wield large, two-handled axes.<br>Attacks with large strikes and uses Electro Slimes to infuse their axes with Electro. Their blows are very lethal.<br>Axes forged from steel are highly conductive material. The image of those tall and strong Crackling Axe Mitachurls holding their axes up to summon lightning is quite majestic to the hilichurls.|[[Archive]]}}

==Trivia==
{{Transclude|Mitachurl|titles|section=1}}
*While using '''Electro Slime Throw''', the Mitachurl may dig up a small [[Mutant Electro Slime]] instead of a normal Electro Slime. This slime will also deal more DMG than the normal one on impact.
